markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Water Dancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=2306) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You glide through the water with graceful ease. When in an aquatic or swamp environment, you ignore the effects of non-magical difficult terrain. In addition, swimming up or down isn't difficult terrain for you.
name: Water Dancer

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Water Dancer Source Ancestry Guide pg. 14 3.0 --- You glide through the water with graceful ease. When in an aquatic or swamp environment, you ignore the effects of non-magical difficult terrain. In addition, swimming up or down isn't difficult terrain for you.
